entry.title: Prelude Manager - Support #388: Can't install Prelude-Manager
entry.content: I was able to get everything installed and running successfully by removing all Prelude apps, upgrading my server to Ubuntu 10.10, and then reinstalling them using. So, no longer an issue that I need support with, although there is apparently a bug for Ubuntu 10.04 users.

entry.title: Prelude Manager - Support #388: Can't install Prelude-Manager
entry.content:
Hey Chris,

    Try building and installing version 1.0.1.

    I also had problems with 1.0.0 but
    everything seems to have been solved
    with the latest release.

    Also you might want to double check
    that you are installing the package with
    'root' user priveleges, especially into etc.
    Other wise you could use the --sysconfdir
    or --prefix option when you are configuring
    to re-divert the install location.

    A.
